name: Harvest From Above
description:
Harvest From Above!
Play as the Sun in a vibrant pixel shooter game, collect ingredients from passing enemy clouds, and deliver the right order to the right customer! Use the color buttons to your advantage, seek out the enemies that may be hiding in plain sight!

How to Play:
Use "WASD" keys to move your Sun. Left-Click to shoot.
Shoot clouds, they will drop ingredients, touch the drops to collect ingredients. 
Give correct ingredients to the hungry customers below.
Touch the garbage pail to dispose any unwanted ingredients. ! Walk over the puddle of color before being able to shoot! 
! Your bullets will bounce.

Limitation: You are your own Enemy.
Your own bullets that hits you will also take an item from your inventory. 

Made by: GhostiStudios Inc. & Qeoli LLC.
Devs: Horou#0128 & Kerryu#0001 (Discord).
